# victoriametricscloud_regions (Data Source)

Fetches the list of available regions for VictoriaMetrics Cloud deployments.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `regions` (Attributes List) List of available regions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--regions))

<a id="nestedatt--regions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `regions`

Read-Only:

- `cloud_provider` (String) Cloud provider of the region.
- `name` (String) Name of the region.
